items.name: useCampaignActivityData
items.returnType: { activities: CampaignActivity[]; activitiesError: Error; allOpportunities: CampaignOpportunity[]; allCampaignActivities: CampaignActivity[]; opportunityMap: Map<number, CampaignOpportunity>; salesMap: Map<number, string>; campaignOptions: { name: string; count: number; }[]; salesRepOptions: { id: number; name: string; count: number; }[]; activityTypeCounts: Map<string, number>; isLoadingCampaigns: boolean; isLoadingActivities: boolean; }

items.name: useCampaignActivityExport
items.returnType: { exportStaleLeads: (staleOpportunities: StaleOpportunity[]) => void; exportActivities: (activityGroups: CampaignActivityGroup[], activities: CampaignActivity[]) => void; }

items.name: useCampaignActivityMetrics
items.returnType: { activityGroups: { uniqueOrgs: number; percentage: number; mostActiveOrg: string; mostActiveCount: number; type: string; activities: CampaignActivity[]; totalCount: number; }[]; staleOpportunities: { lastActivityDate: string; daysInactive: number; stageThreshold: number; isStale: boolean; id: number; name: string; campaign: string | null; customer_organization_name?: string; stage?: string; }[]; totalActivities: number; uniqueOrgs: number; coverageRate: number; avgActivitiesPerLead: string; }
